content:
This message is to inform you that the open-access journal Compositionality may now be found at https://compositionality.episciences.org/. We have moved to the EpiSciences platform to promote the long-term sustainability of our journal.
We are currently accepting new submissions at https://compositionality.episciences.org/submit. We welcome high-quality papers in compositional ideas, most notably of category-theoretical origin.

Best regards,
Jade, @Elena Di Lavore , and @Mario Rom√°n (the Compositionality executive board)
Thanks for making this happen! You're making me want to submit another paper to Compositionality to see how the process works at Episciences.

John Baez said:

Thanks for making this happen! You're making me want to submit another paper to Compositionality to see how the process works at Episciences.

Yes just send one in for fun. I'm sure you have plenty of finished manuscripts just lying around :P
I wish! I keep hoping my papers will grow up and learn to write themselves, but they just lie there unfinished.
